channel.title: Spirit-Scape released[PI]
channel.description:
Well, my time has come. I'm to lazy to start programming more things into the server like the quests. I'm to busy to do anything anymore and even host, so decided to release this for people to have fun, and at least rip shit out idc. I'm a senior this year, so no more programming for a while. I gotta get myself a life >.>
[center]Fixed some dupes thanks to snippets.[/center] [center]Cool free-for-all minigame[/center] [center]2 quests, finish the 2nd one. 2 lazy to do it.[/center] [center]You can't wield dragon dagger unless you finish lost city hehe.[/center] [center]I fixed up some commands, and added tons, and like made alot.[/center] [center]I fixed TONS of warnings on eclipse. So less memory leaks, and it's less unstable.[/center] [center]OH! And has amazing construction thanks to Extreme-X[/center] [center]idk what else.[/center]
The minigame umm is free-for-all, and starts every 5minutes and ends every 5 minutes depending on how many players are in the game. When you die you lose nothing and go to the waiting room. [center][IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/zmmloi.png[/img][/center] [center][IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/2iu43ko.png[/img][/center] [center][IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/t7h8w9.png[/img][/center] [center]Credits: 50% to me. 10% to Extreme-X Scape for teaching me alot and making me figure shit out on my own. I'll post pics later atm i gtg. 40% to Empire Scape.[/center] [center]Client and Source. Some reason, my stupid winrar doesn't archive the client correctly so the client doesn't work after therefore i cannot make changes to the client i have on this laptop only the 1 that i uploaded from my old laptop. So, you have to change the IP or you'll login to my server lol. [url=http://dl.dropbox.com/u/32415818/Client2.rar]Client[/url] and [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?1tdc5hogdyb2ero]Source[/url][/center] More stuff but not gonna add pics.
EDIT: just finished the FFA minigame, and it works perfectly. You wait in the waiting room for 5minutes then it teleports you to the gameroom, and you fight players and the last person standing after the game ends, gets a random item. I left some notes. If anybody wants to give me a video or picture i'd be happy to add. Also, changed some things around perfecting it :).

item.title: Spirit-Scape released[PI]
item.dc:creator: @TheHolyGrail TheHolyGrail
item.description:
@TheHolyGrail wrote:

[quote=“imsuperman05, post:5, topic:411916”][quote author=TheHolyGrail link=topic=513174.msg3725663#msg3725663 date=1314238882]
Cool, but edgeville home and how the npcs are set up really kills it.

And for the FFA minigame, is there a point to it? I mean, you just go in and die? What’s the winner get?
[/quote]
I’m to lazy to move it. The FFA minigame umm Idk what to add for that player though… If you give me a suggestion, like anything random i could add it. That’s why i released it because i ran out of ideas for lunar diplo quest too.

Suggest something cool for me, and i’ll add it in no time.[/quote]Idk, make it so the current winner of the match gets to fly or something rofl. Like that fly animation.

Read full topic
